tool_description: Maps origin and destination locations to carrier-specific shipping zones for accurate rate calculation.
error_messages: Invalid postal code: Provide valid ZIP or postal code format
Unsupported carrier: Carrier code not recognized for zone mapping
International shipping not supported: Selected carrier does not support international destinations
Zone mapping unavailable: Unable to determine shipping zone for provided locations
usage: Provide origin_zip, destination_zip, carrier_code, and optionally destination_country to determine shipping zones.

zone_distance.description: Numeric zone distance (higher numbers indicate longer distances)
